Property Documentation

- (bool) noReboot [read, write, assign]

By default this property is set to false, which means Amazon EC2 attempts to cleanly shut down the instance before image creation and reboots the instance afterwards.

When set to true, Amazon EC2 will not shut down the instance before creating the image. When this option is used, file system integrity on the created image cannot be guaranteed.
